Articles.Content:
I built a space plane, sent it into a very narrow orbit (80km x 35km), and then reentered atmosphere.

at 63km height and close to 2300 m/s speed, I tried to do an EVA.

bill kerman immediately had a red bar above his head and exploded seconds later. apparently the skin temperature was beyond 800K or so, and bill didn't like touching that surface.

KSP 1.0.5

win 7 64 bit

unmodded ;-)
Yeah this is actually by design, it's hot up there at those speeds.
